S04n537:2: ahamapi bhadanta bhagavanbhagavatī śrīrmahādevī tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣorautsukyatāṃ kariṣyāmi |
S04n537:9: yenāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracatiṣyati |
S04n537:12: anekāni ca kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyacintyāni divyamānuṣyakāni sukhāni pratyanubhaveyuḥ |
S04n537:21: yenaitarhi yāṃ yāṃ diśaṃ sattvānāṃ viharati |
S04n537:24: tasyāṃ tasyāṃ diśyanekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasukhopadhānena sukhitāni bhaviṣyanti |
S04n537:26: annena vā pānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatādibhiranyaiścopakaraṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇasamṛddhāni sattvāni bhaviṣyanti śriyo mahādevyāḥ prabhāvena |
S04n537:30: tasyāśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dātavyam |
S04n537:40: alakāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ puṇyakusumaprabhodyānavane suvarṇavarṇadhvajanāmni saptaratnaprabhavane śrīrmahādevī prativasati sma |
S04n537:45: śriyā mahādevyā hastena tasya pūjā kartavyā |
S04n537:48: tasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyānubhāvena tena kālena śrīrmahādevī tasya gṛha samanvāhariṣyati |
S04n537:55: teṣāṃ namaskṛtya vidyāṃ prayojayāmi iyaṃ me vidyā samṛdhyatu |
S04n537:65: samavadhāribhiravaruptakuśalamūlaiḥ prāvṛtadhārayamāṇaiḥ sa saptavarṣā aṣṭāṅgopetā sapañcāsina pūrvāhṇe |
S04n537:67: sarvabuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhapūjāṃ kṛtvātmanaśca sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvajñajñānasya paripūraṇāya |
S04n537:70: tadgṛhaṃ sa caukṣaṃ kṛtvā vihāraṃ cāraṇyāyatanaṃ vāṃ gomayena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca dātavyam |
S04n537:74: tadupādāya tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā vihāre vāraṇyāyatane vā na jātu kenacidvaikalpaṃ kariṣyati |
S04n537:75: hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā ratnena vā dhanena vā dhānyādisarvopakaraṇasamṛddhābhioḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhitāni bhaviṣyanti |
S04n537:77: tena sarvaṃ śriyo mahādevyāḥ premaprabhāvapreṣaṇaṃ dātavyaṃ yāvajjīvaṃ tatropasthāsyati na vilambiṣyati |
